events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been classified as a refund request due to incorrect order delivery.
Assigning a customer service representative to handle the refund case for this order.
Hello! I am sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I will assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and attached is a clear photo of the incorrect item I received.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for handling this quickly. I appreciate the prompt refund offer and your support.
The refund has been processed successfully, and the case is now considered resolved.
We are following up to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory.
We are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us, and please reach out if you need further assistance.
